name: PlotX
description: PlotX is a DeFi Prediction Market protocol built for crypto traders. It enables users to earn rewards on high-yield prediction markets. PlotX enables crypto-asset predictions, like “What will be the price of BTC/USDT in the next 4 hours?” Dubbed as the Uniswap of Prediction Markets, PlotX uses an Automated Market Making (AMM) algorithm to settle markets and distribute rewards on the Ethereum Blockchain without counterparty risk.
